attributes.additional_details: My family has been harassed and intimidated by our landlord, although we pay the rent, they try at every turn to make our life as uncomfortable as possible. We are continuously required to  fight them at regular intervals to protect our home.
attributes.background: Section 21 gives landlords immense power over tenants, this power is disproportionate . It does not give ordinary people peace of mind in their own home. It must be abolished now!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550363

If you have received a Section 21 notice you might find this information by Citizens Advice helpful: https://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/housing/renting-privately/during-your-tenancy/if-you-get-a-section-21-notice/
